r.s: PEAR::HTML_Table makes the design of HTML tables easy, flexible, reusable and efficient.
r.d: The PEAR::HTML_Table package provides methods for easy and efficient design of HTML tables. * Lots of customization options. * Tables can be modified at any time. * The logic is the same as standard HTML editors. * Handles col and rowspans. * PHP code is shorter, easier to read and to maintain. * Tables options can be reused.
r.n: * Added support for line endings and tabs set in HTML_Common (Klaus Guenther) * Requires HTML_Common 1.2 or higher
